name: Rinsan
description:
The infamously unknown Rinsan platformer course is a coveted race for gamers.

Currently features:

  • Lots of stress fun!
  • Simple locomotion mechanics
  • 3D Platformer
  • 1 seamless world level

--

Annyeonghaseyo! I'm a solo indie game developer.

This is my first ever project diving into game development. Inspired by difficult platformer games of old and new, I wanted to develop something everybody could enjoy.

This project is still in active nightly development. 

Any kind of support or feedback would be surreal. 

Thanks,
Rin Lee

@rinlynryn
